thread.title: Essie’s new ballerina-inspired gel nail polish collection is “en pointe”
thread.title_full: Essie’s new ballerina-inspired gel nail polish collection is “en pointe”

author: Claire Beaudreault
title: Essie’s new ballerina-inspired gel nail polish collection is “en pointe”
text:
Essie’s new ballerina-inspired gel nail polish collection is “en pointe” Essie’s latest collection of Gel Couture shades is inspired by the ballet , and we’ve got to get it on our fingers (and toes!)
The six dreamy shades are part of Essie’s DIY long-wear, no-lamp gel-like polish line . The two-step system promises up to 14 days of wear , for half the price of a salon gel manicure. The colors go for $11.50 a bottle, and for two weeks of wear, you’ll be able to put the money you save on the salon toward ballet classes! 

The colors are: Satin Slipper (a champagne ivory), Lace Me Up (a rose pink), Hold the Position (a coral peach pink), At the Barre (a cinnamon nude), Perfect Posture (a periwinkle powder blue), and Closing Night (a soft shimmer gray.)
Essie is the prima ballerina of naming polishes! Those sassy subtle double entendres, those aspirational names (did anyone else sit up straight when they read “Perfect Posture”?) Don’t forget the top coat , it seals the deal with a gel-like finish and staying power. These polishes don’t need a base coat — how easy is this?
Seriously, even the bottles look like ballerinas posing. gel couture’s six NEW lust-worthy shades will have you leaping for weeks with a long-lasting essie mani. Tune in tomorrow as they take center stage with their big debut — we promise, you won’t want to miss this . . . feat. @april_giange @skylarbrandt @capezio 
A video posted by essie (@essiepolish) on Dec 21, 2016 at 9:13am PST 
Essie’s best selling neutral and French manicure base, Ballet Slippers, is a manicurist and client fave, so it figures that another ballet-inspired theme will be a hit!
The iconic Ballet Slippers: Essie Essie swatched the shades on their Snapchat and Instagram story a few days ago, but here’s a peek if you missed it. we're swatching the brand new #gelcouture ballet nudes on snapchat and instastories! come join and tell us which are your fave #essielove #obsessie #balletnudes #gelcouture 
A photo posted by essie (@essiepolish) on Jan 12, 2017 at 3:43pm PST 
Essie always comes correct with the pale blues. Bring the house down when you spin, twirl and bow in this soft shimmer gray. Introducing 'closing night' from the NEW #gelcouture ballet nudes! Photo: @laurenslist #obsessie #essielove #closingnight 
A photo posted by essie (@essiepolish) on Jan 7, 2017 at 5:05am PST 
Slip into #perfectposture from the NEW essie #gelcouture ballet nudes collection. Get your hands on this gorgeous periwinkle powder blue via the link in our profile. #essielove #obsessie 
A photo posted by essie (@essiepolish) on Jan 4, 2017 at 8:59am PST 
These soft shades will help you make an elegant transition from winter to spring. Slip into these six stunning crème nudes and experience the perfection of 'ballet nudes' -- the first addition to the essie #gelcouture collection. Photo: @laurenslist #essielove #obsessie 
A photo posted by essie (@essiepolish) on Jan 10, 2017 at 5:27am PST 
The Ballet Nudes from Essie Gel Couture retail $11.50 per bottle.
